welcome_message_title: Welcome to Krimpen aan den IJssel
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Krimpen aan den IJssel, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and embrace the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers, including check-in counters, baggage claim, and departure gates.

terminals.name: Business Terminal
terminals.description: The business terminal at Rotterdam Zestienhoven Airport is dedicated to providing premium services for business travelers, such as VIP lounges and meeting rooms.

wifi.note: WiFi is free for the first hour, after which a fee may apply.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gilze-Rijen Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Schiphol's main terminal, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serving non-Schengen flights and some intercontinental flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serving non-Schengen flights and some intercontinental flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with a limited time of 4 hours per device.
